raw_data.message:
High tides combined with high river flows from upstream may lead to flooding. 

The next high tide is expected at Trowlock Island at 18:30 on 07/02/2026 and is forecast to reach between 5.00m - 5.14m. The following high tide is expected at 06:30 on 08/02/2026 and is forecast to reach between 4.92m - 5.06m. The forecast is for rain today and overnight. We expect river levels to remain high over the next few days, although we expect tidal peaks to reduce after today.

We are closely monitoring the situation.

Take care and avoid walking, cycling or driving through flood water. Avoid low lying roads near rivers, which may be flooded. 

This message will be updated by 20:00 07/02/2026 or as the situation changes.
